batch_role: Management of programming problems and their relationships in a coding competition or educational platform.
key_features: Entity classes to represent problems and their relationships.
Repository interfaces for CRUD operations and custom queries.
Service interfaces and implementations for managing problem data.

Error handling and validation for program and problem associations.

Focus on user difficulty types and problem difficulty view types suggests a tailored user experience.
The project likely involves managing problems or challenges, possibly for a coding platform or educational tool.
Custom exceptions and error codes suggest a focus on robust error handling.
